articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Chonma Electrical Machine Plant
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Chonma Electrical Machine Plant
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the Chonma Electrical Machine Plant.
					 After being briefed on the monument to the field guidance given by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un looked round the room for the education in the revolutionary history.
					
					 Looking at historic relics and mementoes with great attention, he looked back with deep emotion on the proud path covered by the plant under the care of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 This area where the plant is located and various other places of the country are closely associated with the footprints of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, he noted, adding: "Coming to my mind as I have reached the entrance to the plant was the image of Kim Jong Il who visited this plant several times including the period of the Arduous March, instilling conviction of sure victory and optimism into its workers."
					
					 He highly appreciated the feats performed by the workers of the plant, recalling that they have turned out in hearty response to the instructions given by Kim Jong Il on the spot and successfully carried out their production quotas despite manifold bottlenecks and difficulties. 
					
					 He underscored the need for the party members and other workers of the plant to glorify the leadership feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il forever by increasing the production of efficient electrical machines, always remembering the glorious tradition in which they have upheld the WPK with increased production.
					
					 He went round different places of the plant to learn about the production and set forth the tasks to be fulfilled for its modernization.
					
					 Looking at the electrical machines produced by the plant, he said that they are proving effective in reality and high in demand. He praised its employees for waging a dynamic drive to overfulfill their national economy plan, true to the party's intention.
					
					  He underscored the need to expand the capacity of the plant and energetically step up the updating of the production processes in order to supply cutting edge electrical machines to various sectors of the national economy.
					
					 He gave an instruction to push ahead with the work to consolidate the material and technical foundation of the plant in a big way so that it may mass-produce multi-purpose electrical machines.
					
					 He underlined the need for the plant to put the production processes on a CNC basis at higher level in order to ensure the best quality of its all products to be favored by the users.
					
					 The development of new products, increase in production and improvement of quality would be unthinkable apart from science and technology, he said, calling for arranging well the room for disseminating science and technology and paying deep attention to the work for steadily raising the level of technical skills of the employees.
					
					 He told officials to successfully build not only welfare and service facilities but also a hostel and cultural hall so that the producers may work and enjoy a cultural and emotional life without any inconvenience.
					
					 He promised to solve all the problems arising in the work to expand the production capacity, update the production processes and radically face-lift the plant.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and conviction that the workers of the plant would face-lift it as required by the age of the knowledge-based economy and as befitting a highly civilized socialist country and successfully mass-produce modern electrical machines and thus make a contribution to the cause of building a thriving nation. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Jang Jong Nam, Pyon In Son, Yun Tong Hyon, Pak Jong Chon and Hong Yong Chil.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Imbuing Party and Revolutionary Ranks with One Ideology
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Imbuing Party and Revolutionary Ranks with One Ideology
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday editorially calls on all party members, service personnel and other people to add luster to the glorious history and tradition in which they have pushed ahead with the work to imbue the party and revolutionary ranks with one ideology and win a shining victory in the advance in the new century of Juche by dint of ideology.
					 The lifeline of the revolution is protected and inherited by ideology, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 Inexhaustible is the strength of the truth of the Juche idea and the Songun idea of the Workers' Party of Korea. Steadfast is the faith of the WPK, service personnel and other people to make the march started on Mt. Paektu to the last, taking this revolutionary idea as a lifeline.
					
					 We have a lot of things that capitalism can never imitate nor have. What we are most proud of among them is the single-minded unity of the leader, party, service personnel and people.
					
					 The single-minded unity of the DPRK serves as the strength of Songun Korea and a mainstay for building a thriving nation. The world progressives envy this unity and even the enemies recognize this in fear, being browbeaten by the DPRK.
					
					 Invincible is the cause of building a thriving nation in the DPRK which translates all the dreams and ideal of the people into reality by dint of the great idea and single-minded unity.
					
					  It can be said that the ongoing drive to defend socialism is a struggle to overpower imperialism not only in battle sites but in all fabrics of social life.
					
					 There continues the historical advance of the DPRK which is winning victory after victory while overwhelming enemies by dint of ideology.
					
					 The DPRK will smash all moves of the imperialists and fully demonstrate the dignity, mightiness and invincibility of Songun Korea in the new century of Juche through powerful ideological campaign.

articles.title: Papers Observe Anniversary of Formation of Chongryon
articles.content:
Papers Observe Anniversary of Formation of Chongryon
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's leading newspapers Sunday congratulate the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on the 59th anniversary of its formation.
					 Chongryon was formed on May 25, Juche 44 (1955) according to the policy of President Kim Il Sung that overseas compatriots' movement should become a national patriotic movement truly conducive to the revolution of the DPRK from a Juche-based stand.
					
					 The formation of Chongryon made it possible to turn the movement of Koreans in Japan into a national patriotic movement guided by the great Juche idea, and the Koreans in Japan could independently carve out their destinies, being affiliated to the genuine compatriots' organization which represents and defends their national rights and interests, Rodong Sinmun says.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il carried forward the President's idea of the Juche-based overseas compatriots' movement, performing undying feats for the strengthening of Chongryon. 
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un, carrying forward the intention and love of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, has shown warm loving care and trusted the Koreans in Japan, regarding them as the same kinsmen.
					
					 He sent messages and congratulatory message to the meeting of officials of branches of Chongryon, to the organization on the occasions of the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and the 23rd Congress of Chongryon. They are important guidelines to be held fast to by Chongryon in the new century of Juche.
					
					 Chongryon and Koreans in Japan should usher in a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Minju Joson in an editorial says it is the pride of the DPRK and honor of the nation to have the powerful Chongryon, adding that only victory and glory are in store for Chongryon advancing under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: 23rd Congress of Chongryon Held
articles.content:
23rd Congress of Chongryon Held
 Tokyo, May 25 (KNS-KCNA) -- There took place the 23rd Congress of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) at the Korean Hall in Tokyo, Japan on Saturday and Sunday in the historic period when a decisive turn was taking place in the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the Koreans' movement in Japan.
					 Present at the congress were Chairman Ho Jong Man and vice-chairmen of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon and delegates elected by institutions, bodies and enterprises at various levels of Chongryon.
					
					 A congratulatory message sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un to the congress was read out there.
					
					 A report on the examination of qualifications was made there to be followed by a discussion on the following agenda items:
					
					1. "On report to the 23rd congress of Chongryon"
					
					2. "On settlement of finance and draft budget"
					
					3. "On election of officials of the central organs of Chongryon"
					
					The report to the congress was made by Chairman Ho Jong Man.
					
					The reporter stressed that the 23rd Congress of Chongryon is the one of loyalty and single-minded unity to hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem as a unitary center of unity and leadership and the one of succession and innovation to develop the work of Chongryon on a fresh high level by thoroughly carrying out the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Un sent a historic congratulatory message to the congress, providing important guidelines for the development of Chongryon and the movement of Koreans in Japan, he noted.
					
					 He referred to the fact that in the period under review Chongryon and Koreans in Japan have held Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal sun of the nation and dynamically waged their movement under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The emulation among the branches of Chongryon participated in by 30 branches and responded to by 125 others helped increase the role of the branches of Chongryon and fresh successes and experience were gained in revitalizing the work of chapters and grass-roots level organizations of Chongryon.
					
					 Great efforts have been exerted to develop national education and the work with the younger generation and Korean traders and industrialists in Japan even under so hard political and economic situation in the period under review.
					
					 Chongryon has made tangible efforts conducive to the economic construction and improvement of the standard of the people's living in the homeland by giving play to the patriotic enthusiasm of the officials of Chongryon and other Koreans in Japan including traders and industrialists. It also joined in the nation-wide struggle for the country's reunification under the banner of By the Korean Nation Itself.
					
					 The reporter pointed to the major tasks to be fulfilled by Chongryon in four years to come so as to usher in a new heyday along the true path of the movement of Koreans.
					
					 The general orientation of the work of the 23rd term of Chongryon is to thoroughly implement the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem as a unitary center of unity and leadership and usher in a new heyday of Chongryon as required by the era of Kim Jong Un, in hearty response to the message sent by him to the congress, he noted, adding:
					
					 All the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan will celebrate the 60th anniversary of Chongryon with proud successes in their work and hold with splendor events involving all the organizations of Chongryon and compatriots and thus strikingly demonstrate the might of Chongryon, a unit of loyalists and ranks based on single-minded unity.
					
					 We will develop Chongryon into a mighty organization with steadfast tradition, strong mass foundation and bright prospect along the path of Juche.
					
					 Chongryon will hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem as a unitary center of unity and successfully ensure his monolithic leadership over the Koreans' movement in Japan.
					
					 It will turn the patriotic movement into the one centered on the rising generation with the congress as a momentum.
					
					 We will channel all our efforts to making sure that the rising generation which received national education may play a pivotal role in giving steady continuity to the proud history of Chongryon as it is fine in its tradition and great in its succession.
					
					 Chongryon will strenuously wage a patriotic movement for the happiness of compatriots and the rosy future of the posterity.
					
					 It will make a tangible contribution to the building of a thriving nation in the homeland and the accomplishment of the country's reunification and conduct brisk external activities.
					
					 A report on the work of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon was made to be followed by speeches on the first agenda item.
					
					 The speakers evinced their firm will to certainly usher in a new heyday of Chongryon in hearty response to the congratulatory message sent by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Read out at the congress were congratulatory messages sent by various organs in the homeland including the Committee for Aiding Overseas Compatriots of the DPRK and the greetings extended by personages of various circles in the homeland, overseas compatriots' organizations and organizations of Japan.
					
					 Congratulatory speeches were made by Dewi Soekarno, director of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council, Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, Fumihiro Himori, chairman of the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, and other personages of various circles of Japan and personages of political parties including the New Komeito Party of Japan, the Japanese Democratic Party and the Social-Democratic Party of Japan.
					
					 Representatives of Korean youth and students in Japan mounted the stage and warmly congratulated Chongryon on its 23rd Congress.
					
					 The Committee for Nominating Officials of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon and the Committee for Examining the Finance Settlement and Draft Budget were formed at the congress.
					
					 The report to the congress was adopted as a decision of the congress.
					
					 A report on the second agenda item was made by the Committee for Examining the Finance Settlement and Draft Budget to be followed by the announcement of the results of examination.
					
					 At the congress Ho Jong Man was elected chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, Nam Sung U, Pae Ik Ju, Pae Jin Gu, Pak Ku Ho and Kang Chu Ryon vice chairpersons of the committee and Pae Jin Ku director general of the General Affairs Department of the committee.
					
					 Members of the Central Standing Committee and the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon were elected at the congress.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted there.
					
					 At the end of the congress the Central Standing Committee was formed at the 1st session of the 23rd Chongryon Central Committee.
					
					 While the congress was under way, an art performance "Eternal Chongryon under the care of sun" was given and a photo exhibition was held.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon 23rd Congress
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon 23rd Congress 
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the 23rd Congress of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Sunday. 
					 The letter said the 23rd Congress of Chongryon, which was successfully held under the deep care of Kim Jong Un, proudly reviewed the work of its 22nd term and discussed and decided the orientation of its work and main tasks for the four years to come.
					
					 The letter expressed the will to develop Chongryon, a patriotic legacy of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and overseas Koreans' organization of Kim Jong Un, into a powerful organization with a steadfast tradition, strong popular base and a bright prospect, thus advance the movement of Koreans in Japan along the path of Juche only. 
					
					 The letter went on:
					
					 The officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan will cherish deep in their minds Kim Jong Il's patriotism and make tangible contributions to the building of a thriving socialist nation by sharing their destinies with those in the homeland and wage a dynamic struggle for putting an end to the outside forces' interference and achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country by concerted efforts of the nation. 
					
					 As instructed by Kim Jong Un all officials of Chongryon will become true servers of the compatriots who give play to their patriotic enthusiasm, always living and working with them, and exert all efforts for providing a happy and abundant future to the compatriots and their descendants. 
					
					 The letter made a pledge to live up with loyalty to the deep trust and great expectation of Kim Jong Un by working hard as vanguard in implementing the tasks set forth in his congratulatory message and the decision of the congress of Chongryon, its embodiment, and registering shining results in its work with conviction of sure victory despite the desperate moves of the enemies inside and outside Japan to stifle Chongryon and manifold difficulties and stern ordeals.

articles.title: Greeting to Jordanian King
articles.content:
Greeting to Jordanian King
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Sunday sent a message of greeting to Abdullah â…¡, king of Jordan, on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Jordan would grow stronger, wishing the king and people of Jordan greater successes in their work to achieve the peace, development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Chairman of Commission of African Union
articles.content:
Greetings to Chairman of Commission of African Union
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Sunday sent a message of greeting to Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma, chairman of the Commission of the African Union, on the Day of Africa.
					 The message said the Korean people are extending invariable support and solidarity to the African people in their just struggle to reject all forms of foreign domination and intervention and achieve peace, stability and common development and prosperity of the continent with their independent and concerted efforts.
					
					 It reiterated the steadfast policy stand of the DPRK government to positively develop the traditional and excellent relationship of friendship and cooperation with the AU and its member states onto a new high stage.
					
					 It sincerely wished the AU fresh and greater successes in its work to push forward the continental integration by meeting worldwide challenges.

articles.title: S. Korean "Saenuri Party" Slammed for Blocking Probe into Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean "Saenuri Party" Slammed for Blocking Probe into Ferry Sewol Disaster
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People on May 21 carried an editorial denouncing the puppet group for laying a stumbling block in the way of probing the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 The editorial went on:
					
					 Now when the people are in grief, the "Saenuri Party" persists in its shameless political offensive.
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" refused the demand of the opposition party that Park Geun Hye should be included in the investigation into the state policy as regards the ferry disaster.
					
					 In order to probe the truth behind the disaster and punish those responsible for it, anyone should not be excluded from the investigation.
					
					 Park Geun Hye and Chongwadae should be included in the investigation as they showed incompetence and irresponsibility in the whole course of putting the accident under control.
					
					 During the one month since the accident, the regime failed to rescue all those missing and showed the extreme incompetence in calming down the people's resentment.
					
					 Not only the opposition party but also the bereaved families of the victims of the ferry disaster demanded the limitless investigation containing the "president".
					
					 Very despicable is the attitude of the "Saenuri Party" employing petty tricks to meet its political interests over the tragedy which should not recur.
					
					 The angered people will not remain a passive on-looker to the Park regime and the "Saenuri Party" if they try to gloss over the investigation into state policy.

articles.title: S. Korean Students Call for Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Sinking Accident
articles.content:
S. Korean Students Call for Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Sinking Accident
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Unabated in south Korea is the struggle of students demanding the probe into the truth behind the ferry Sewol sinking accident and punishment of those responsible for it, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 South Korean students staged a sit-in after storming a building of the puppet regime in Seoul on May 22.
					
					 They bitterly denounced the Park Geun Hye group for its murderous act of not saving hundreds of persons.
					
					 They called for a thorough probe into the truth about the disaster and severe punishment of those responsible for it.
					
					 They also demanded the resignation of Kim Ki Chun, presidential chief of staff, and Nam Jae Jun, director of the Intelligence Service, who still go unpunished though they were involved in the past fraudulent "presidential election."
					
					 On May 21 students of religious circle staged a protest after forming a theological students' group for a hunger strike on the situation.
					
					 They held a press conference at Chonggye Plaza in Seoul in connection with the formation of the group.
					
					 They had their hair cut in protest against the puppet group, declaring that they would stage a hunger strike in demand of the probe into the truth about the ferry disaster and the resignation of Park Geun Hye.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Words Do Not Match Her Deeds: S. Korean Internet Newspaper
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Words Do Not Match Her Deeds: S. Korean Internet Newspaper
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- A south Korean internet newspaper carried an article titled "President Park Geun Hye's words do not match her deeds".
					 The article said Park, reneging on her promise to "restrict the dispatch of public prosecutors to outside organizations," appointed a former prosecutor as chief secretary for civil administration of Chongwadae before bringing him back to a post in the prosecution, thus making a mockery of the people.
					
					 The article went on:
					
					 A man nominated as chief secretary for civil administration of Chongwadae worked as an investigation planner at the Supreme Prosecutor's Office. He handled the case of the former "president", driving him to death.
					
					 In the "talk to the people" over the ferry Sewol tragedy, Park Geun Hye offered a "proposal for reform of public servants' community", claiming she "feels responsibility".
					
					 Nothing normal can be found in the work being done by Park, the article deplored.

articles.title: Judgment of Park Geun Hye Demanded
articles.content:
Judgment of Park Geun Hye Demanded
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Korean Economic Workers in China in a statement on May 19 called for turning out in the struggle to judge the Park Geun Hye group of murderers.
					 Now sweeping across south Korea is the struggle of people angered at the inhuman act of the Park Geun Hye group of hooligans which buried hundreds of students at the sea, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The struggle of people of all social standings including women is an eruption of curse and resentment at the Park Geun Hye group's traitorous rule and corrupt south Korean society.
					
					 The recent tragedy was an unprecedented massacre deliberately committed by the Park group.
					
					 Park has not yet made sincere apology but shift the responsibilities onto her yes men. She invited her American master to visit south Korea, kowtowing to him and currying favor with him.
					
					 Such prostitute, special-class traitor has to be eliminated at an early date.
					
					 All overseas Koreans and all members of the Federation are well aware that it is not possible to expect anything as long as the venomous serpent remains in Chongwadae.
					
					 The statement vowed to actively turn out in the actions to judge the Park Geun Hye group at any cost.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Kyrgyzstan
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- The Kyrgyz committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Bishkek on May 20.
					 A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party who is chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse events praising the sacred revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Cape Verde President Refers to Development of Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Cape Verde President Refers to Development of Relations with DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- Hong Son Phyo, DPRK ambassador to the Republic of Cape Verde, on May 15 presented his credentials to Cape Verde President Jorge Carlos Fonseca.
					 The president expressed the will to make positive efforts to develop the relations between the two countries in the future, too.

articles.title: ITAR-TASS Introduces Rice-transplanting in DPRK
articles.content:
ITAR-TASS Introduces Rice-transplanting in DPRK 
 Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- ITAR-TASS on May 22 introduced the rice-transplanting in the DPRK.
					 It said:
					
					 Inhabitants in Pyongyang and other cities of the DPRK go to the countryside to give a helping hand to cooperative farms in rice transplantation in May every year.
					
					 Many institutions work out plans to help nearby farms. Service personnel and young people always take the lead in helping farms.
					
					 Rice transplantation is done by machines or manual labor.
					
					 One can see many people working on the paddy fields where red flags are put up in the suburbs of Pyongyang. 
					
					 Calls and songs from loudspeaker cars encourage them.
					
					 Paddy fields are clad green thanks to their work.
					
					 Socialist emulations are now underway to successfully finish rice transplantation.
					
					 ITAR-TASS reported about the brisk media agitation about the rice-transplanting campaign.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Fabrica de Maquina Electrica de Chonma
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Fabrica de Maquina Electrica de Chonma
 Pyongyang, 25 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea dirigio sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Maquina Electrica de Chonma.
					 Luego de escuchar la explicacion sobre el monumento en memoria de la visita de orientacion de los hombres sin pares del monte Paektu, recorrio la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria.
					
					 Viendo con atencion los objetos y datos historicos recordo con emocion profunda la trayectoria orgullosa recorrida por la fabrica bajo la direccion de los Generalisimos.
					
					 Dijo que al igual que todas las partes del pais estan impregnadas tambien en alrededores de esta fabrica las huellas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y destaco que al entrar en la entrada de la fabrica vino a la mente la imagen del Dirigente quien la visito en varias ocasiones incluido el tiempo de la marcha penosa cuando la patria habia pasado arduas pruebas y dio la fe en la victoria segura y optimismo a los obreros de aqui.
					
					 Evaluo altamente las proezas de estos diciendo que levantados en pleno acato de las instrucciones del Dirigente cumplieron infaliblemente las tareas de produccion superando las pruebas y dificultades interpuestas.
					
					 Subrayo que los militantes del partido y otros trabajadores de la fabrica deben glorificar siempre las hazanas de direccion de los Generalisimos con la produccion de muchas maquinas electricas de alta funcion sin olvidar para siempre la gloriosa tradicion que ha defendido el partido con el aumento de produccion.
					
					 Pasando revista a varios lugares de la fabrica se entero del estado de produccion y presento las tareas para modernizarla.
					
					 Al ver las maquinas electricas producidas por la fabrica senalo que los productos surten gran efecto en la realidad y es alta su demanda y evaluo a los empleados que hacen ingentes esfuerzos por sobrecumplir el plan de la economia nacional apoyando el proposito del partido.
					
					 Enfatizo que para suministrar a varias ramas de la economia nacional las maquinas electricas ultramodernas es preciso ampliar la capacidad de produccion de la fabrica y modernizar sus procesos.
					
					 Hay que impulsar la labor para establecer con firmeza la base material y tecnica de la fabrica para que produzcan en gran cantidad las maquinas electricas de multipropositos, agrego. 
					
					 Destaco que a fin de producir en el maximo nivel cualitativo todos los productos de la fabrica para que ganen buena reputacion entre los usuarios, hay que realizar en el alto nivel la tecnologia de CNC de los procesos de produccion. 
					
					 Al margen de la ciencia y la tecnologia no se puede imaginar el desarrollo de nuevos productos y el aumento de produccion y calidad, senalo y subrayo que se debe prestar profunda atencion a la labor para elevar el nivel de tecnica y habilidad de los empleados acondicionando bien la sala de divulgacion de ciencia y tecnica.
					
					 Hay que acondicionar bien todas las instalaciones de servicio publico, el albergue y la casa de cultura para que los productores hagan la vida de trabajo y la cultural sin ninguna incomodidad.
					
					 Destaco que el mismo resolveria todos los asuntos que se presentan en ampliar la capacidad de produccion, modernizar los procesos de produccion y cambiar radicalmente el ambiente de vida de la fabrica.
					
					 Expreso gran esperanza y conviccion de que la clase obrera de la fabrica contribuira a la realizacion de la causa de la construccion de la patria prospera cambiando la fisonomia de la fabrica conforme a la demanda de la epoca de economia basada en intelectualidad y la figura del pais civilizado socialista y produciendo gran numero de modernas maquinas electricas.
					
					 Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Jang Jong Nam, Pyon In Son, Yun Tong Hyon, Pak Jong Chon y Hong Yong Chil.
